section.p: Contains information of the various directed professional services, activities, or methods concretely concerned with the support, treatment, and material designed to aid and to increase the welfare of the patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Contains the unique identifier for direct service category provided.

Contains exactly one [1..1] nbrOfHours with data type Integer
Contains the number of hours for the directed services provided

Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Contains the unique identifier for direct service category provided.

Contains exactly one [1..1] nbrOfHours with data type Integer
Contains the number of hours for the directed services provided
